amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and increases funding for State and local law enforcement assistance (drug courts) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and to increase funding for State and local law enforcement assistance (drug courts) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
